mapper.insert: insert into partner_content (pc_content,pc_writer, pd_idx, pc_file, pc_date ) values (#{pcContent}, #{pcWriter}, #{pdIdx}, #{pcFile}, now() )
mapper.select: select pl_idx, user_id1, user_id2, pl_money, pl_date from pay_list where user_id1=#{userId1} and user_id2 = #{userId2} order by pl_idx desc
select pd.pd_idx, pd.user_id1, pd.user_id2, up.user_photo, up.user_tag from partner_detail pd, user_profile up where user_id1=#{userId1} and pd.user_id2 = up.user_id
select pdc_comment, user_id, pdc_idx from partner_detail_comment where comment_deleted_yn = 'N' and pc_idx = #{pcIdx}
mapper.insert: insert into partner_detail_comment (pdc_comment, user_id, pd_idx, pc_idx) values (#{pdcComment}, #{userId}, #{pdIdx}, #{pcIdx})
